snippet.textDisplay: For those that dont know shadowpelt drops the legendary fish grenade. I highly recommend you dont pick this item up. Its glitched and causes you whole inventory to become invisible. If you keep the grenade in your bank it does the same thing. You will need to drop the grenade and reload your game to fix the bug.
snippet.textOriginal: For those that dont know shadowpelt drops the legendary fish grenade. I highly recommend you dont pick this item up. snippet.textDisplay:
The only thing that I don't get, is them saying that this patch was tied to performance, which doesn't at all feel true as nothing feels any different.

However, what they should be calling it is a stability patch, since they are eliminating crashes caused by the game itself and or GPU related hardware, its not at all going to fix performance, but its a step to improving game stability following with performance later on I believe.
snippet.textOriginal:
The only thing that I don't get, is them saying that this patch was tied to performance, which doesn't at all feel true as nothing feels any different.

However, what they should be calling it is a stability patch, since they are eliminating crashes caused by the game itself and or GPU related hardware, its not at all going to fix performance, but its a step to improving game stability following with performance later on I believe.
